Package controller.state.gamephase.gameplay

Class IssueOrders

java.lang.Object
controller.state.Phase
controller.state.gamephase.GamePhase
controller.state.gamephase.gameplay.GamePlay
controller.state.gamephase.gameplay.IssueOrders
public class IssueOrders
extends GamePlay
IssueOrder class that inherits GamePlay interface to support functions during this command
